long_description: The perfect complement to a running dress, REI Fleet Compression shorts match the intensity of your workout with sleek comfort. Moisture-wicking, lightweight fabric delivers 4-way stretch and stretch-mesh fabric panels enhance ventilation. Fabric protects skin from too much UV light with a UPF rating of 50+. Elastic waistband with drawcord fine-tunes the fit and won't stifle skin underneath. Gusseted crotch increases freedom of motion. You'll run farther without chafing thanks to the low-profile, flatlocked seams. Zippered rear pockets stash small items such as a key or I.D. Reflective detailing along seams increases visibility in dim light. The REI Fleet Compression shorts offer an active fit that allows a full range of motion.
short_description: The perfect complement to a running dress, REI Fleet Compression shorts match the intensity of your workout with sleek comfort.
